analysis.description:
DefaultSweeper.sweep (/unique_chucks/32/0xa2d3c535f3a31fc624654cbaaae7d899a3731342.sol#189-221) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- success = destination.send(amountInWei) (/unique_chucks/32/0xa2d3c535f3a31fc624654cbaaae7d899a3731342.sol#213-214)

UserWallet.sweep (/unique_chucks/32/0xa2d3c535f3a31fc624654cbaaae7d899a3731342.sol#157-166) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	controller.sweeperOf(_token).delegatecall(msg.data) (/unique_chucks/32/0xa2d3c535f3a31fc624654cbaaae7d899a3731342.sol#165-166)
